column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=First , I called ahead to the salon and asked for an appointment to make sure they knew I was coming .
#text=I told them that I just wanted a hair cut , no coloring or curling .
#text=I did n't want anything complicated since that takes more time .
#text=I looked at the internet to find pictures of haircuts that I liked and printed them out .
#text=I arrived at the salon about 10 minutes early and waited patiently in the seating area .
#text=When it was my turn , I said hello to the stylist and showed her my pictures .
#text=I asked if she could do a haircut like that for me and if it would suit me .
#text=She showed me about where she wanted to cut my hair , but I thought it was too short .
#text=I told her so politely and she adjusted the length until it was just right for me .
#text=Then , she washed and dried my hair and checked the length with me again .
#text=Once I said yes , she started to cut it .
#text=I liked how it was looking , so I did n't need to tell her to stop .
#text=She let me look at myself in the mirror .
#text=I thanked her , paid for her services , and left a tip .
